description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The Arriflex camera suitable for photo-reporting and for studio photography won its designer August Arnold the 1965 Gold Diesel Medal of the Association of German Inventors; trampoline gymnastics at Neun Kirchen; handball final championship between Salingen and Grun-Weiss-Dankersen; 5th legislative period of the German Bundestag; Frankfurt-on-Main home of Goethe; art instructors experiment in Dortmund; equestrian sports in Hamburg - draghunts.
